meta.job_title: Nursing Quality and Process Improvement Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quality and organizational excellence by leading cross-functional quality and process improvement initiatives.
Serve as mentor to specialists and analysts.
Influence leaders and lead complex improvement projects.
Supervise specialists, analysts, or administrative support staff.
Collaborate with a diverse team of nursing quality improvement professionals to support operations, strategy, and innovation.
Directly support nursing specialty areas including behavioral health and psychiatry services.
Identify and drive analytic needs for improvement projects/initiatives.
Support leaders in the development of problem charter and selection of best approach to solve a particular problem.
Make decisions based on analyses and data.
Challenge leaders and their current processes when improvement is needed.
Influence and gain commitment from all members of the project team.
Lead, manage, and mentor specialists and analysts regarding tools, methodologies, and technologies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in an appropriate discipline (Master's preferred)
